data.name: Visual Novel Maker - Fantastic journey
data.detailed_description:
Ready to travel around the world to exotic lands, dangerous jungles, lonely deserts, and haunted forests? Then this is the soundtrack for your journeys! Created by ayatosoundcreate, this DLC pack contains 22 BGM perfect for your travels, featuring music for relaxing or lively towns / pubs / bars, active, jungle, ruins, and more!

Features:

* 22 BGM suitable for scenes in multiple destinations
* Music for ruins, desert, pubs, taverns, and more!
* Royalty-free music to use in your game

Tracklist:

01_area_Ancient ruins
02_area_den of thieves
03_area_Jungle
04_area_Lava cave
05_area_steppe01
06_area_steppe02
07_area_steppe03
08_area_Thieves Guild
09_area_waterway
10_area_Witch's Forest
11_shop_Arms shop
12_shop_Tool store
13_spot_ bar
14_spot_Alpine
15_spot_Desert city
16_spot_fortified city
17_spot_funny guild
18_spot_lively village
19_spot_Poor village
20_spot_quiet village
21_spot_sad city
22_spot_Youth village
